com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom

Class BezierCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.geom.BezierCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve<Path<Vector2>>

    public final class BezierCurve
extends Object
implements Curve<Path<Vector2>>
    A Curve implementation that interpolates the sample using Bezier splines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BezierCurve(List<Vector2> sample, float tresholdPerpDistance)
      Constructs a new BezierCurve by simplifying the sample using the perpendicular distance simplification.
      BezierCurve(Polyline sample)
      Constructs a new BezierCurve by creating B-Spline control points from sample.
      BezierCurve(Polyline sample, Polyline bSplineControlPoints)
      Constructs a new BezierCurve from the specified sample and bSplineControlPoints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Path<Vector2>> splines()
      Returns this curve as a list of splines.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BezierCurve

        public BezierCurve(List<Vector2> sample,
                   float tresholdPerpDistance)
        Constructs a new BezierCurve by simplifying the sample using the perpendicular distance simplification.

        Equivalent to: 

         new BezierCurve(
     newPerpDistSimpl(
         sample,
         tresholdPerpDistance
     )
 )
        Parameters:
        sample - a list of sample input points to interpolate
        tresholdPerpDistance - treshold delta for perpendicular distance polyline simplification of the sample
        See Also:
        BezierCurve(Polyline)

      • BezierCurve

        public BezierCurve(Polyline sample)
        Constructs a new BezierCurve by creating B-Spline control points from sample.

        Equivalent to: 

         new BezierCurve(
     sample,
     new BSplineControlPoints(sample)
 )
        Parameters:
        sample - sample input points to interpolate
        See Also:
        BezierCurve(Polyline, Polyline)

      • BezierCurve

        public BezierCurve(Polyline sample,
                   Polyline bSplineControlPoints)
        Constructs a new BezierCurve from the specified sample and bSplineControlPoints.
        Parameters:
        sample - sample input points to interpolate
        bSplineControlPoints - B-spline control points, used to help interpolate the sample to a Bezier curve

    • Method Detail

      • splines

        public List<Path<Vector2>> splines()
        Returns this curve as a list of splines.
        Specified by:
        splines in interface Curve<Path<Vector2>>
        Returns:
        the list of splines that represent this curve
